channel.title: CVE Feed for ELECOM CO.,LTD. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ELECOM CO.,LTD. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20648|2024-08-03T17:45:44.997Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-300febk-s
item.description: ELECOM WRC-300FEBK-S allows an attacker with administrator rights to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20649|2024-08-03T17:45:45.385Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-300febk-s
item.description: ELECOM WRC-300FEBK-S contains an improper certificate validation vulnerability. Via a man-in-the-middle attack, an attacker may alter the communication response. As a result, an arbitrary OS command may be executed on the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2021-20853|2024-08-03T17:53:23.052Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20routers
item.description: ELECOM LAN routers (WRH-733GBK firmware v1.02.9 and prior and WRH-733GWH firmware v1.02.9 and prior) allows a network-adjacent attacker with an administrator privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20643|2024-08-03T17:45:45.126Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- ld-ps%2Fu1
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in ELECOM LD-PS/U1 allows remote attackers to change the administrative password of the affected device by processing a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2021-20651|2024-08-03T17:45:45.326Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20file%20manager
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in ELECOM File Manager all versions allows remote attackers to create an arbitrary file or overwrite an existing file in a directory which can be accessed with the application privileges via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20863|2024-08-03T17:53:23.031Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20routers
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in ELECOM routers (WRC-1167GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2A firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2H firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-B firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-W firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-1750GS firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-1750GSV firmware v2.11 and prior, WRC-1900GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GSTA firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2SP firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2-G firmware v1.25 and prior, and EDWRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior) allows a network-adjacent authenticated attackers to execute an arbitrary OS command with the root privilege via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20862|2024-08-03T17:53:22.711Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20routers
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in ELECOM routers (WRC-1167GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2A firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2H firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-B firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-W firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-1750GS firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-1750GSV firmware v2.11 and prior, WRC-1900GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GSTA firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2SP firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2-G firmware v1.25 and prior, and EDWRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior) allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to bypass access restriction, and to obtain anti-CSRF tokens and change the product's settings via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20645|2024-08-03T17:45:44.968Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-300febk-a
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ELECOM WRC-300FEBK-A allows remote authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-21799|2024-08-03T02:53:36.272Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20router
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ELECOM LAN router WRC-300FEBK-R firmware v1.13 and earlier allows an attacker on the adjacent network to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20646|2024-08-03T17:45:45.325Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-300febk-a
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ELECOM WRC-300FEBK-A allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators and execute an arbitrary request via unspecified vector. As a result, the device settings may be altered and/or telnet daemon may be started.

item.title: CVE-2021-20855|2024-08-03T17:53:22.696Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20routers
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ELECOM LAN routers (WRH-733GBK firmware v1.02.9 and prior and WRH-733GWH firmware v1.02.9 and prior) allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20647|2024-08-03T17:45:45.337Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-300febk-s
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ELECOM WRC-300FEBK-S allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators and execute an arbitrary request via unspecified vector. As a result, the device settings may be altered and/or telnet daemon may be started.

item.title: CVE-2021-20852|2024-08-03T17:53:22.655Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20routers
item.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in ELECOM LAN routers (WRH-733GBK firmware v1.02.9 and prior and WRH-733GWH firmware v1.02.9 and prior) allows a network-adjacent attacker with an administrator privilege to execute an arbitrary OS command via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20864|2024-08-03T17:53:22.628Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20routers
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in ELECOM routers (WRC-1167GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2A firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2H firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-B firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-W firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-1750GS firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-1750GSV firmware v2.11 and prior, WRC-1900GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GSTA firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2SP firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2-G firmware v1.25 and prior, and EDWRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior) allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to bypass access restriction, and to start the telnet service and execute an arbitrary OS command via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20738|2024-08-03T17:53:21.857Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-1167fs-w%2C%20wrc-1167fs-b%2C%20and%20wrc-1167fsa
item.description: WRC-1167FS-W, WRC-1167FS-B, and WRC-1167FSA all versions allow an unauthenticated network-adjacent attacker to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20860|2024-08-03T17:53:22.693Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20routers
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ELECOM LAN routers (WRC-1167GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2A firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2H firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-B firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-W firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-1750GS firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-1750GSV firmware v2.11 and prior, WRC-1900GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GSTA firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2SP firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2-G firmware v1.25 and prior, and EDWRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior) allows a remote authenticated attacker to hijack the authentication of an administrator via a specially crafted page.

item.title: CVE-2021-20859|2024-08-03T17:53:22.694Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20routers
item.description: ELECOM LAN routers (WRC-1167GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2A firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2H firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-B firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-W firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-1750GS firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-1750GSV firmware v2.11 and prior, WRC-1900GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GSTA firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2SP firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2-G firmware v1.25 and prior, and EDWRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior) allows a network-adjacent authenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-25915|2024-08-03T04:49:44.278Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20routers
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in ELECOM LAN routers (WRC-1167GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2A firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2H firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-B firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-W firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-1750GS firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-1750GSV firmware v2.11 and prior, WRC-1900GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GSTA firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2SP firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2-G firmware v1.25 and prior, and EDWRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior) allows a network-adjacent authenticated attacker to bypass access restriction and to access the management screen of the product via unspecified vectors.

item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ELECOM LAN router WRC-2533GHBK-I firmware v1.20 and prior allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ELECOM LAN router WRC-2533GHBK-I firmware v1.20 and prior allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.description: ELECOM LAN routers (WRH-733GBK firmware v1.02.9 and prior and WRH-733GWH firmware v1.02.9 and prior) allows a network-adjacent attacker with an administrator privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.description: WRC-300FEBK, WRC-F300NF, WRC-733FEBK, WRH-300RD, WRH-300BK, WRH-300SV, WRH-300WH, WRH-H300WH, WRH-H300BK, WRH-300BK-S, and WRH-300WH-S all versions allows an unauthenticated network-adjacent attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20644|2024-08-03T17:45:45.343Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-1467ghbk-a
item.description: ELECOM WRC-1467GHBK-A allows arbitrary scripts to be executed on the user's web browser by displaying a specially crafted SSID on the web setup page.

item.title: CVE-2021-20861|2024-08-03T17:53:23.040Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20routers
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in ELECOM LAN routers (WRC-1167GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2A firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-1167GST2H firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-B firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-2533GS2-W firmware v1.52 and prior, WRC-1750GS firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-1750GSV firmware v2.11 and prior, WRC-1900GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GSTA firmware v1.03 and prior, WRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2SP firmware v1.25 and prior, WRC-2533GST2-G firmware v1.25 and prior, and EDWRC-2533GST2 firmware v1.25 and prior) allows a network-adjacent authenticated attacker to bypass access restriction and to access the management screen of the product via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-21173|2024-08-03T02:31:58.999Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20routers
item.description: Hidden functionality vulnerability in ELECOM LAN routers (WRH-300BK3 firmware v1.05 and earlier, WRH-300WH3 firmware v1.05 and earlier, WRH-300BK3-S firmware v1.05 and earlier, WRH-300DR3-S firmware v1.05 and earlier, WRH-300LB3-S firmware v1.05 and earlier, WRH-300PN3-S firmware v1.05 and earlier, WRH-300WH3-S firmware v1.05 and earlier, and WRH-300YG3-S firmware v1.05 and earlier) allows an attacker on the adjacent network to execute an arbitrary OS command via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20856|2024-08-03T17:53:22.658Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- elecom%20lan%20routers
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in ELECOM LAN routers (WRH-733GBK firmware v1.02.9 and prior and WRH-733GWH firmware v1.02.9 and prior) allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20650|2024-08-03T17:45:45.277Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- ncc-ewf100rmwh2
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ELECOM NCC-EWF100RMWH2 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators and execute an arbitrary request via unspecified vector. As a result, the device settings may be altered and/or telnet daemon may be started.

item.title: CVE-2024-36103|2024-08-02T03:30:13.076Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x5400gs-b
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in WRC-X5400GS-B v1.0.10 and earlier, and WRC-X5400GSA-B v1.0.10 and earlier allows a network-adjacent attacker with an administrative privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands by sending a specially crafted request to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-26258|2024-08-02T00:07:19.139Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x3200gst3-b
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, and WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier allows a network-adjacent attacker with credentials to execute arbitrary OS commands by sending a specially crafted request to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-34021|2024-08-01T13:44:44.251Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-2533gs2v-b
item.description: Unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability exists in ELECOM wireless LAN routers. A specially crafted file may be uploaded to the affected product by a logged-in user with an administrative privilege, resulting in an arbitrary OS command execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-39607|2024-08-01T01:17:00.982Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x6000xs-g
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability exists in ELECOM wireless LAN routers. A specially crafted request may be sent to the affected product by a logged-in user with an administrative privilege to execute an arbitrary OS command.

item.title: CVE-2024-40883|2024-08-01T01:18:01.801Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x6000xs-g
item.description: Cross-site request forgery vulnerability exists in ELECOM wireless LAN routers. Viewing a malicious page while logging in to the affected product with an administrative privilege, the user may be directed to perform unintended operations such as changing the login ID, login password, etc.

item.title: CVE-2024-34021|2024-08-01T01:15:56.174Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-2533gs2v-b
item.description: Unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability exists in ELECOM wireless LAN routers. A specially crafted file may be uploaded to the affected product by a logged-in user with an administrative privilege, resulting in an arbitrary OS command execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23910|2024-07-24T16:18:46.820Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-1167gs2-b
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ELECOM wireless LAN routers and wireless LAN repeater allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to hijack the authentication of administrators and to perform unintended operations to the affected product. Note that WMC-X1800GST-B and WSC-X1800GS-B are also included in e-Mesh Starter Kit "WMC-2LX-B".

item.title: CVE-2024-36103|2024-07-03T21:12:15.764Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x5400gs-b
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in WRC-X5400GS-B v1.0.10 and earlier, and WRC-X5400GSA-B v1.0.10 and earlier allows a network-adjacent attacker with an administrative privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands by sending a specially crafted request to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-29225|2024-06-04T17:58:03.969Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x3200gst3-b
item.description: WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, and WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier allow a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to obtain the configuration file containing sensitive information by sending a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-26258|2024-04-04T00:03:41.930Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x3200gst3-b
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, and WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier allows a network-adjacent attacker with credentials to execute arbitrary OS commands by sending a specially crafted request to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23910|2024-04-04T00:07:37.144Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-1167gs2-b
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ELECOM wireless LAN routers allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to hijack the authentication of administrators and to perform unintended operations to the affected product. Affected products and versions are as follows: WRC-1167GS2-B v1.67 and earlier, WRC-1167GS2H-B v1.67 and earlier, WRC-2533GS2-B v1.62 and earlier, WRC-2533GS2-W v1.62 and earlier, WRC-2533GS2V-B v1.62 and earlier, WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, and WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2024-21798|2024-04-04T00:06:40.248Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-1167gs2-b
item.description: ELECOM wireless LAN routers contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability. Assume that a malicious administrative user configures the affected product with specially crafted content. When another administrative user logs in and operates the product, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser. Affected products and versions are as follows: WRC-1167GS2-B v1.67 and earlier, WRC-1167GS2H-B v1.67 and earlier, WRC-2533GS2-B v1.62 and earlier, WRC-2533GS2-W v1.62 and earlier, WRC-2533GS2V-B v1.62 and earlier, WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, and WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2024-25568|2024-04-04T00:02:32.323Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x3200gst3-b
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, and WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands by sending a specially crafted request to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-25579|2024-04-04T00:08:47.746Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-1167gs2-b
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in ELECOM wireless LAN routers allows a network-adjacent attacker with an administrative privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands by sending a specially crafted request to the product. Affected products and versions are as follows: WRC-1167GS2-B v1.67 and earlier, WRC-1167GS2H-B v1.67 and earlier, WRC-2533GS2-B v1.62 and earlier, WRC-2533GS2-W v1.62 and earlier, WRC-2533GS2V-B v1.62 and earlier, WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, and WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2024-26258|2024-06-20T15:22:40.714Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x3200gst3-b
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, and WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier allows a network-adjacent attacker with credentials to execute arbitrary OS commands by sending a specially crafted request to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-21798|2024-07-05T17:21:09.066Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-1167gs2-b
item.description: ELECOM wireless LAN routers contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability. Assume that a malicious administrative user configures the affected product with specially crafted content. When another administrative user logs in and operates the product, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser. Note that WMC-X1800GST-B is also included in e-Mesh Starter Kit "WMC-2LX-B".

item.title: CVE-2024-25568|2024-07-31T20:22:00.490Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x3200gst3-b
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in ELECOM wireless LAN routers allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands by sending a specially crafted request to the product. Affected products and versions are as follows: WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier, and WMC-X1800GST-B v1.41 and earlier. Note that WMC-X1800GST-B is also included in e-Mesh Starter Kit "WMC-2LX-B".

item.description: Cross-site request forgery vulnerability exists in ELECOM wireless LAN routers. Viewing a malicious page while logging in to the affected product with an administrative privilege, the user may be directed to perform unintended operations such as changing the login ID, login password, etc.

item.description: OS command injection vulnerability exists in ELECOM wireless LAN routers. A specially crafted request may be sent to the affected product by a logged-in user with an administrative privilege to execute an arbitrary OS command.

item.description: ELECOM wireless LAN routers contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability. Assume that a malicious administrative user configures the affected product with specially crafted content. Note that WMC-X1800GST-B is also included in e-Mesh Starter Kit "WMC-2LX-B".

item.title: CVE-2024-29225|2024-08-02T01:10:54.663Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-x3200gst3-b
item.description: WRC-X3200GST3-B v1.25 and earlier, and WRC-G01-W v1.24 and earlier allow a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to obtain the configuration file containing sensitive information by sending a specially crafted request.
